Mysterious Lackey:
Take part in 5 competitions of the Festival Chaos of the Mysterious Mansion and bring me 5 Certificates of Participation, to get another gift.
A gift you can only get 1 per day. Keep in mind that to obtain the evidence necessary to stay in the arena until the end of the battle.
On the invitations you have no questions? Keep in mind that every day from 5 PM till 12 am every 30 minutes, you can get an invitation to the Arena of Chaos.
Well, see you soon.
